website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for those seeking a holistic daily planner without paying a lot.
pros: Blank "mind map" section with corresponding vision board
Includes monthly calendar and simple weekly view
Comes with 3 bookmarks, stickers, and pen loop
cons: Undated design takes time to set up

customer_reviews.title: Love this planner
customer_reviews.text: Love this planner. I love the free-form. You can skip weeks you know you're out of town or whatever and save those pages for another time. I think my favorite part of this planner is the first two pages. Everything to do with this planner is how YOU make it. For me, it also helped (kind of made) me reflect on things I really do want and goals I really do want to achieve. Words of affirmation was difficult for me to fill out so I looked them up online and wrote the ones that spoke to me most. How I want to/should be seeing myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this planner- Bought one as gift and one for me
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve seen a lot of different planners out there and this one is fantastic. + all blank pages...fill in months you need +stickers for important events + bookmarks for more than one section It’s a nice a leather bound surface that’s a hardcover. I can’t say anything negative about the planner. It works fantastic and is a great way to stay on top of work. CHECK VIDEO OUT TO SEE FOR SELF!!
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for implementing goals
customer_reviews.text: This Day Planner is much more than a day planner for me. I have been using it to help keep my goals in action and ideas in one place. I am also using this as a gratitude journal. For those of you that need to physically write out your goals to strategize and implement, I highly recommend this planner. On a side note, Jen (owner) has provided the most impeccable customer service I have seen in a while. Will be a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Fresh F.

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for him and he couldn't be happier!!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé has somehow managed to succeed in life up until his mid-20s without a planner... He's extemely ADHD and never was able to keep up with it (I think he gave up long ago). However, when juggling family, personal and work life lately, things began to fall through the cracks... After searching for the "ideal" plannner, I purchased this for him and he couldn't be happier!!!! Highly recommended!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MMB22

customer_reviews.title: Hyped myself up for nothing...:(
customer_reviews.text: I was at first so so excited about this. I reserached many different journals like this. However, I felt there was not enough space to write side notes and the mind map thing...just did not work or make sense to me. I put it down for a week and actually forgot all about it. It did not "motivate" to have clearer thoughts and or habits.... Super bummed out about the product. :(
customer_reviews.author: Professor35

customer_reviews.title: Smudges and elastic strap broke. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Update: the elastic strap has now broken ( the one that holds the book closed) it’s not even the new year yet and this planner is done. I opened it maybe 10 times, if that and it already broke. Will e buying a Passion planner to replace this piece of junk. Origa review: I’ve used this planner before and love. Ordered the pink one back in September for the upcoming year. Just opened it and there is a blue smudge on the front and one on the back 😩😩😩
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I bought this planner and absolutely loved it for the first year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this planner and absolutely loved it for the first year! It lasted well, there’s plenty of room for notes, and is streamlined and appealing, while working well still. The ribbons fell out after about six months, but it still worked well and held up on the outside. I reordered the same planner this year, and was disappointed to find the new planner’s elastic for a pen is way too big. It’s useless. I’m disappointed because one of the things I loved about this planner was how nice it was to always have a pen on-hand even if I only brought my planner to a meeting. The new elastic is too big for any reasonable pen.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Blue Elephant journal binding tore off 3 weeks after delivery
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand of planner before, and currently have one that has been used for over a year with no structural issues. This particular planner, from the same Elephant brand, was not properly bound. I bought it for an adult who lives with me. This is his review: Excellent organizational structure for a general-use planner, has been very helpful in my everyday life. However, in only 3 weeks, the binding suddenly tore away from one side of the journal's sheets. I'm going to find some good glue to bind mine back together, but heads up, [PUBLISHER]: make sure your book bindings use enough glue! This is a disappointingly brief amount of time for a binding to fail.
customer_reviews.author: A. Verdant

customer_reviews.title: Get the larger size... or save your money
customer_reviews.text: I liked the planner and the idea of it, but for the price it was a very average planner and didn't increase my productivity at all. I did like the undated style and the notes section in back, but the weekly reflections and goals were tiny, each day had only a few lines and I felt like I just really didn't have the space to plan anything. I would have really liked a page for weekly tasks and then some larger sections for each day which allow you to plan which day you want to complete each task. This might work for you, but it didn't work well for me. If you're interested, I'd definitely recommend the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far.
customer_reviews.text: Best journal I have ever bought in 40 years; the only thing missing is a page for telephone numbers. Some of us old folks do not have smart phones. It has a terrific combination of calendar and notes. Having page numbers allows for cross indexing. I have already bought a new one for this coming year. (For me this will start on May 1st. :) I also found a very skinny address book that fits nicely in the pocket in the back along with my Gospel of John, Constitution and other odds and ends. This year I received email which contained several fantastic documents on goal planning and motivation. Good Job! I would give it six stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A. North-gates

customer_reviews.title: Prefer the Simple Elephant for weekly task planning
customer_reviews.text: Like some of the other reviewers, I ordered both the Panda planner and the Simple Elephant. Both planner have nice features, but for my own purposes - planning my tasks for the week and having a space for reflection to make next week better than this one - I definitely prefer the Simple Elephant. I love the simple additions like the pen holder and the document pocket. I like the layout, the feel of the cover, and the the feel of the pages.
customer_reviews.author: JocW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect planner!!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I love the creative idea of using an elephant as a cute design on a planner because “elephants never forget”. I was so stoked to use a planner that didn’t have the dates already entered. I’ve wasted so much paper with previous planners by purchasing midway through the year. This planner really has everything you need. A book mark, pen holder, calendar, weekly summary and goals, and even lined paper in the back. Oh! And stickers!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Not too useful in the digital age
customer_reviews.text: The small monthly calendars are useless. Can’t write enough detail that smal for my busy days. Use as a notebook/journal but that’s about it
customer_reviews.author: JenK

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!! I couldn't ask for more
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this planner. I love that there is the monthly calendar as well as weekly. I love the weekly goals. I love that each week you can write what you did well and what you would like to improve. I love that there is a notes section. I love that it has a hard cover and that there are three separate ribbons for place markers. I do wish that it was maybe stitched together or bound with wire. I'm worried that the glue that's holding the binding won't last with the temperature changes as well as high humidity in my area. ***Please note that as of now the binding is fine and holding up***
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely journal and planner. I spent a lot of time looking at all the new planners that promise to help me achieve EVERYTHING this year, and this one is on point at a great price. Goals for the week, reflection by the week, yearly vision board space, three bookmarks to move around...lots of neat details. I definitely recommemd it! If space were not an issue I'd try to have room for daily gratitudes, but as it is I just add them in each day. The paper is adequate, if not hefty, weight. Customer service follow up has been great. Definitely recommend the Simple Elephant. ❤
customer_reviews.author: Freeamanda

customer_reviews.title: Small, Plain & Sturdy Planner
customer_reviews.text: This certainly is a very simple, portable planner. It wasn't exactly what I was looking for, and it's undated. The pages are nice and thick, and the cover is sturdy, which I appreciate. But the planner is smaller than I'd like, with not enough writing space for me. Saturday and Sunday have tiny writing spaces, which I find to be really unhelpful. Plus, I'm starting in January so I prefer a dated book. That was my fault for not being observant enough with the description. I'm giving it 4 stars because it's a nice little book that is built well but not necessarily designed particularly well. It will get the job done if you just want something plain and compact.
customer_reviews.author: P@¡n ₩@rr¡0rTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Needs to have quality control before being shipped
customer_reviews.text: I bought this planner for 2019. I liked it so much, I bought it again for 2020. However, there needs to be a quality control inspection before each planner is shipped. When I opened the planner, I discovered the cover was upside down. Which means the front is in the back and the back cover is in the front. Nothing terrible but annoying. I just assumed for the price, it would be perfect. I don't think I will buy this planner again. Update: I could not use this planner. I threw it out and will not purchase again. It's too expensive to not have been inspected before being shipped.
customer_reviews.author: MaryannC

customer_reviews.title: Many pros and only 1 con!
customer_reviews.text: What I didn't like about it was blank dates. I'd much rather dig right into using it rather than having to put dates in. I was under the impression that it was a 2020 calendar with the other amenities of plans, goals, ect. I was disappointed when it came but kept it anyways. The rest of the layout is pretty intriguing. I like the idea of setting goals, success, and the positivity of "what can I do better" instead of failures! Over all I think I'm going to like using this book. I'm going to use it with a positive attitude and see where it leads.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Wenning

customer_reviews.title: Forces my brain to work differently
customer_reviews.text: This planner forces me to use my linear brain differently, which is a good thing. The unstructured format takes getting used to. I am sorry that one of the three ribbons is frayed and may not last the year. I'll contact them to see if they will resolve this issue. With the frayed ribbon I'm tempted to give 3.5 stars. 8.12.17 Very pleased with the excellent customer service. I received a replacement planner. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Newme

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Customizable. ADHD friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Raging ADHD here! Most planners overwhelm me, but this planner actually helped me stay organized and engaged the whole year! The undated feature is awesome because it took pressure off me, even though I have been able to keep up with it without missing many days. I also love that there is plenty of room for writing down notes without being confined to a specific “notes” section. The weekly recap is very simple, and it allowed me to quickly assess my progress. Again, no pressure to write out answers to a million prompts. I love this planner for its simplicity and how easy it is to customize it to what you need. ADHD friendly at its best :)
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: A Well Thought Out Planner
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy about the quality of the planner and I think the planner layout is very well done. I didn't realize that I had to fill out the Months and dates in the planner myself. I confess I missed that part in the description. However I am going to count it as a plus, because I have the opportunity to use coloured pens and markers to really make the planner my own. I am excited to use the planner in 2019 to keep myself more organized and efficient. Again I really like the layout of the planner, it is very well thought out and inclusive. I will purchase another one for 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Myrt Hatch

customer_reviews.title: My first simple elephant.
customer_reviews.text: Filling out the planner and completing the mind map allowed me to really reflect and think about my goals for the year. Things i really didn't make time to think about before. I love the size, and page layout. I also love that every week you can celebrate successes and jot down what can be done better. This planner keeps you focused on tasks at hand and your own well being. This is my first Simple Elephant and definitely won't be my last. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Little bummed out
customer_reviews.text: I bought this agenda before about a couple years back. I loved it. Bought again for a second time, and was really excited for the new colors, especially the lilac. When I first purchased, blue was the only available color. Agenda arrived today and only had 8 undated months, rather than the 12 that was promised. Little disappointed to say the least. I really wanted to love this product like I did last time 😪 . color is beautiful though!
customer_reviews.author: Laura D.

customer_reviews.title: above average unique planner, you could probably do better though
customer_reviews.text: I used this pretty consistently for about a semester. It's nice however I wish it had a bit more substance for more organization. It's nice to be able to add dates at your own pace though, so if you're looking for something simple and adaptive you're in the right place. Also, the cover gets kinda dirty and dented with normal wear and tear. I'm a neat person and it kinda got a little messed up in between my backpack and desk. I haven't used much of the mind map and vision board pages, but it's kinda cool that they're there. The month and week spread was what I was initially looking for.
customer_reviews.author: T. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent planner and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this planner so much! I've ordered one for next year and considering another one for the year after! It keeps me very organized and focused. Edit: One year later, I tried a different planner thinking it would substitute or be better than this one. I was SO wrong. I immediately ordered another one for this year, and may get one for NEXT year because I STILL love it so much! 3 years running.
customer_reviews.author: CC in Texas

customer_reviews.title: great concept just needs a huge upgrade
customer_reviews.text: just got it in last night and started to plan out my next couple months and write down notes. love the layout and the feel of it is great. love the non dated portion so you can fill as you go. the Huge downside for me is the paper itself is very light and the writing bleeds through the pages which isnt nice because it messes with the the next page. just beware this happens, if i would have known this would have went with a planner with better paper.
customer_reviews.author: james mckee

customer_reviews.title: Easily Customizable
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. A great day planner that's easily customizable. The dates are blank, so it's easy to start whenever, and make up ground when missing a day/week/month. The paper has a good weight to it, so I can write in pen or pencil, and pens don't bleed through. Plenty of room for the whole year, plus notes, and pocket inside the back cover. Oh, and stickers - who doesn't like stickers? I've been using it for a month and a half now, and I like it. Once this year is complete, I would buy another for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Curran

customer_reviews.title: Big hit for college age daughter gift 🎁
customer_reviews.text: Totally rely on others reviews when purchasing things, & appreciate the high quality of this....I don’t make a ton of money, this was a gift for my college sophomore daughter,& she LOVED UT! I ultimately chose this brand because of the reviews, & was not disappointing!!! Awesome layout, quality, design & she reports very usable as a working/college student!!! Win!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for purpose, have a few issues listed!
customer_reviews.text: Great gor all projects to get attended to! Out if all colors, i dislike Blue. But in reviews, this was better for my needs than Panda, less than my annual Franklin Covey planners. I just decide to make the vision board expand with glue stick and clear vynil onto the exterior, interior! So no longer blue! Marble adhesive would be pretty too! The black box it came in was so elegent, i wondered why not use that material as an option? Ps. Made in China. Not sure if sweatshop labor, work conditions, More Fair Trade and MADE IN USA! Amazon! Id paid more for a recycled sustainable planner!
customer_reviews.author: Raw4L1fe-Vegan Fashion Maven.

customer_reviews.title: Overall AWESOME planner but more colors PLZ!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this planner!!! The look is simple yet beautiful, the little elephant logo is cute, and the design is very reasonable and user-friendly. I love that it's undated so I can start whenever I like without wasting a page. There's plenty of space to write but not too much that you can't fill them up. The paper is very high-quality and smooth to write on. Everything is great except that there's only one color! I can see myself continue to use this planner in many years to come but I really want a different color every year! It would be awesome if you have more beautiful colors to choose from! :)
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Pens bleed through...
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge fan of this planner. The 12 monthly calendars are all together at the front instead of scattered throughout the weekly pages. I bought the recommended pens (recommended by Amazon) and am super disappointed that they bleed through the pages easily. I wish I’d returned it before I wrote in it, though I wasn’t keen on paying $5.99 to return a $19.99 planner.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Herriott

customer_reviews.title: I like the section for writing goals for the year
customer_reviews.text: The Simple Elephant has been very helpful to plan my day before I get stated. I like the section for writing goals for the year. It is helpful to read them over every morning to be reminded of them. Since I started using The Simple Elephant I have found myself accomplishing more of my objectives daily. I recommend this daily planner.
customer_reviews.author: lisa m.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful planner! The quality is fantastic and I love that it has a elastic pen holder. I also love the fact that you can fill in the dates according to the month that you start. I always feel like I’m wasting half of my planner if I get a new one in the middle of the year wonderful planner! The quality is fantastic and I love that it has a elastic pen holder. I also love the fact that you can fill in the dates according to the month that you start. I always feel like I’m wasting half of my planner if I get a new one in the middle of the year. if it had printed dates
customer_reviews.author: Meg C.

customer_reviews.title: Great. I wish it was a bit more ADHD friendly
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great planner so far. A few things I wish were different were thicker pages, and better instructions for people like me who get overwhelmed by setting goals and then failing those goals. My "what I could do better" section is basically "don't get sick and avoid having to put your best friend cat to sleep". Prompts for things would be nice. I made a mind map but the vision board is blank. A highs and lows section for each week might be nice. Thinking about the best part of the week and the worst can be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: C. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: No dated on the pages
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice planner! However the set up is not for me, there are no dates on any pages which is kind of nice I guess but I would rather have a laid out year with all the correct dates for the year instead of figuring it out on my own. Also the monthly sheets are all towards the front of the book rather than infront of the weekly planner pages which I dont like either. It's a cute idea but I will ne returning it for something a little more organized
customer_reviews.author: kelsi

customer_reviews.title: Highlighters don’t bleed through!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed how organized it was. The calendar pages are located in the front and the “to do” or they pages with lines are in the middle. This planner makes it easy for me to keep track of what I’m doing and keep check of my goals, plus it’s the perfect size to carry around (it is not to bulky). I use muji high lighters and a gel pens to write my stuff down and nothing has bled through. The paper quality is very nice. Absolutely no complaints compared to the other agendas I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great planner
customer_reviews.text: This planner is great....it has a the requirements a business professional may need to keep track of their daily schedule. I really didn't care for the stickers. As for my requested improvements...i wish the planner came in different colors. While blue is ok...im in the military and black is a more universal color to go with. Also I wish there were a few pages specifically designed for listening important contacts. Otherwise the planner has become a great addition to my work day.
customer_reviews.author: quadre

customer_reviews.title: Best Seller on Amazon IMO
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this journal. I love the idea of having a good section for gratitude and mind mapping. When I received it, I got an email from the seller thanking me for my purchase. I had a couple of issues and we discussed them in back and forth email correspondence. NEVER have I experienced this level of customer service with any purchase I've made online. I would recommend this seller to anyone a million times over. Many thanks again Simple Elephant Journals!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Life/Work Planner
customer_reviews.text: I love that this planner is the right size to carry in a bag and/or backpack. Not too chunky but enough room to write. There are four main sections of this planner, the focus section, the monthly view, weekly views and then blank lined pages. There are also three bookmarks so you can easily navigate between each section. The dates are not included making this a planner great for starting any time of year or skipping time if needed! The pocket in the back is a nice touch but I don’t use it much. I’m a Graduate student and work two part time jobs. This planner helps me stay very organized and focused throughout the year.
customer_reviews.author: SarahJo

customer_reviews.title: Lasts A Full Year, Great Features
customer_reviews.text: I love that there’s a mind map and vision board in the front, and a pocket for treasures in the back. Love that the planner has 3 main sections: month view, week view, and notes. You can start using it at any time during the year, as there are no pre-printed dates. This is the first planner I’ve actually used consistatly the entire year. It’s part planner, part journal for me. The planner itself has held up to being used regularly, and being thrown into bags and backpacks, and taken on road trips and camping trips. The only “con” is I’d like to see more color options.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Love the simplicity of this planner.
customer_reviews.text: I used to do bullet journals, I loved the ability to customize, but man was it time consuming! I love the compromise between a bullet journal and a standard planner. This one allows me a lot of freedom to put in some of the things that were important to me to add to my bullet journal, but takes a lot of the leg work out and allows me to get everything in quickly. I've been consistently buying these for about 3 years and it's safe to say I will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Tawn

customer_reviews.title: Bought planners in the past - but I ACTUALLY used this one!
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this as a gift last year and loved it! I purchased this for myself and as a gift. It comes in a great box and is overall a beautiful planner. I hate using the word planner, because it’s sommuch more than that. It helps you set goals and evaluate your week. I love that it has the months together - because it makes planning quick. There are also multiple ribbons for easy tracking and organizing. It also comes with stickers, but I did the add on - because I found that I liked them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Horning

customer_reviews.title: Just What I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using my simple elephant planner since 1/1/19. I love it. The paper is nice. Ink doesn’t bleed through. It’s undated so I can start whenever I want. The pen loop is sturdy and it’s handy to alway have a pen nearby. My daughter has a Panda Planner and I considered getting that, but it only has three months and it has a lot more detail than I need. This keeps me on track for the basics of life - appointments, shopping, cooking, broad goals. If I have a detail-oriented project in progress I keep a separate folder for that.
customer_reviews.author: Reading Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Normal pen bleeds through
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. I like the flexibility of being able to start and date the calendar whenever I want to start. But I am very disappointed at the bleed through (using Bic Atlantis pen) it looks sloppy. I have some fancier pens ordered so I will suck it up if they don’t bleed through. But at this price I expect no bleed through. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JLynnRNmomof4DomesticGoddess

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price but could be better
customer_reviews.text: The pink journal is a very pretty color. The months/weeks are blank and you must fill in the dates. The book is divided into three sections: months, weeks & notes. In my opinion the journal could be better if four week entries directly followed that month, instead of being in an entirely different location. Also, the journal would have been better if the binding was spiraled. Time will tell on the durability of the book.
customer_reviews.author: Trail runner

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I like how it’s organized except the quality is poor. This is the second day I used it and when I went to take the pen out of the elastic holder, it ripped right out. Also I was writing near where the paper meets the binding and the pen poked through the paper. I’m debating on returning it but I already wrote a bunch of stuff inside.
customer_reviews.author: kindleworm

customer_reviews.title: A little weird but so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far I enjoy it. I keep forgetting it at home though so I don't use it as much as I wanted to. One con I found is that the monthly, weekly and note areas are not together, like it doesn't go from month to week to notes each month. Its 12 months of the month area 52 weeks of the week area and then all 52 pages of the notes are in one section. Would have been nicer if it was divided like month, week, notes , month, week notes etc. Other than that I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Crossy JTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: May not work for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was really going to love this planner. It is cute and well made with great reviews but I cannot get past the hardbound design. You can't lay the planner open and turn pages without holding one or both sides down. It is too irritating for me. Also (I know I should have known better) but I am not a fan of entering in all of my own dates. At this point I'm going to look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Dacar

customer_reviews.title: Love and actually use all the time!
customer_reviews.text: I usually start out trying to be better at using planners and always fail. This is the first planner I've stuck with and LOVE it. It really helps keep me on track with goals and make things not feel so overwhelming (which is part of their whole mission.) This is perfect for any type of personality that likes making lists, anyone starting a big project or a big life change, or anyone who needs to organize their time better. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Nice planner.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after being laid off from work to keep me focused and help inspire me to my next adventure. I like it a lot, but I am a bit disappointed in the quality. They ship this in a nice box that says "Designed in New York, Made in China." I was impressed with the presentation (it's a bit Apple-like), but the pages are not completely flat and the binding is not perfect. I wish it was Made in America rather than China, though I'm sure it is more economical this way. It also came with a few stickers - another thing I would have liked to have seen more of. It's a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pinna Family

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this planner!
customer_reviews.text: My therapist asked me to journal every day, but only the highlights, no long winded ponderings. So I bought this planner in the hopes that having something cute would encourage me to keep going. And it worked! I adore this planner. I love the 3 book marks idea. There's ample room for notes. I love the successes and goals area. It helps keep me focused and reflective. My only complaint is that Saturday and Sunday don't have more space in them. I have to write smaller on those days. But otherwise, I'm completely obsessed with this thing. Will definitely be buying another one next year.
customer_reviews.author: NeonPinkSheep

customer_reviews.title: Cute lightweight affordable planner for anytime of the year!
customer_reviews.text: Totally love this planner. Just came in the mail in a cute box along with a welcome letter. Great size and weight. Probably weighs just as much as my smart phone. I know that when I bought the planner the month calendar is not followed directly by the weekly sheets but that's ok because I am going to put a sticky tab or a bookmark to hold my weekly spot. It comes with 55 pages in the end to take notes on along with a pocket at the end if the book to add coupons, appt cards or anything special needed to be carried along side the planner
customer_reviews.author: Snow fam

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid journal, jilt to withstand daily use. It is nice looking, I like the strap to keep it closed. It includes ribbons to mark the three separate location I most often use. I like the month at a glance at the beginning of the book, with the weekly fill in portions, followed by the areas to write freely (lined pages). On the inside flap is a sleeve to keep individual pieces of paper.
customer_reviews.author: CD Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase - will probably buy one again next year!
customer_reviews.text: The cover is nice, the lines inside are perfect (not wide and not super skinny), the paper is fine (I mostly use gel pens). The pen loop is not too small - but it came 'unglued' after just 3 weeks use, so I'm glueing it back into it's spot... This works almost like a bullet journal for a not too busy person - I'm loving it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Linda O

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: If you’re already somewhat of an organized person, then this planner is just fine. It’s layout initially appealed to me because I can see the full week overview; However, I found that I need the hourly breakdown of my days to stay on task and productive. I was trying to find a less expensive replacement for my Law of Attraction planner by Freedom Mastery, but I ended up ordering the LOA after all.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This planner exceeded my expectation! I have never been excited with my amazon order and I order a LOT. When I recieved it, I thought it was a mistake because I completely forgot I ordered it. It came in a really nice black gift box, then when I opened it, it was the planner! I was WOWED. Jaw dropping moment and I just got so excited. Never I felt like it when ordering from Amazon until that moment. This company really made my day. I have and will recommend this to everyone looking for a planner. Will be ordering again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn S

customer_reviews.title: Worth twice the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this during Prime Days for under $10. I was expecting a mediocre quality planner for the price as I normally buy one at HomeGoods or Ross. The packaging alone felt like a very expensive planner! The cover of the book itself seems really durable and I loved the texture. I absolutely can't wait to start filling this out. I think my favorite part is that it's an UNdated planner so you can gift it for birthdays, promotions, graduations, etc. The quality is so nice they'll never guess it cost so little.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: I'm organized!
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time staying organized and remembering all of my to do‘s. This planner helps me plan and take notes and the little elephant symbol reminds me too go back and see if I've forgotten anything. I actually feel like I'm getting things done!! I love the texture and look of the cover and the weight of the planner. Also, I really love the 3 bookmark ribbons to help open right up to the right spots!! I will buy the same one again.
customer_reviews.author: lininsc

customer_reviews.title: A simple, lovely planner
customer_reviews.text: This is the only planner I've actually stuck to using. The way its structured allows it to be flexible for me to input daily to-do lists or event reminders, and the weekly goals sections are actually useful. The structure of the planner is very durable for the price - it doesn't bend easily and the elastic strap has not snapped after a full year of use. I just purchased this planner for a second time to me it's easier to use, more compact, and a much better value than the passion planner which I have used before
customer_reviews.author: rershnersh

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is a great notebook if you don't want a dated calendar, so you can begin the calendar at any time. I've been using this planner for 3+ years now. I love it because I take a lot of notes and not many planners have endless pages for you to take notes.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Goal-Setting And Reflection Made Easy!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! I’ve used planners for some time and was looking for a new one for this cycle. I love the organization of the Si,plea Elephant, especially for short-term (monthly, specifically) goals. I like the way this planner lays out long-term and short-term goals for organization and the “simple elephant” reminder to review makes it almost effortless! I’ll definitely be sticking with this planner for some time!
customer_reviews.author: DCS

customer_reviews.title: 1 year later-still holding up!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this planner because of the simplicity of it-plus it had great reviews. After nearly a year of using it, I love it. It's so simple, extremely sturdy and durable. I throw it around and it gets smashed at the bottom of my bag and instead of having a pen in the loop I put it between the pages I'm working on and use the strap to hold it together. The planner has endured so much of a beating from me. I couldn't recommend it more.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Tunell

customer_reviews.title: I'm divided about this
customer_reviews.text: I do like the quality; it is well crafted. The pages are thick enough that the ink doesn't go through the page. On the negative side, I don't like the week/daily arrangement. In conclusion, check it well before you buy it
customer_reviews.author: Juan Guillermo Cassanello Gracia

customer_reviews.title: Good organizer
customer_reviews.text: I like this planner. It has everything laid out for me. The only complaint I would have, which obviously to some people is a HUGE plus, is that the dates are not pre-written. I understand that this makes it easy to sell more, and it is fine for the actual calendar part, I just don’t feel like going through and labeling all of the individual parts for the days of the week. However, there is plenty of room for notes and for you to write words of encouragement to yoursel!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful planner! It comes in a nice black gift ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful planner! It comes in a nice black gift box with the book inside. When you open it it has a spot for who the book belongs to, the following page is about your focus. First question is "i am grateful for...". This first page puts you in the right mindset of planning for your future goals. Blank calander to start when it first arrives, and has a weekly planner as well. The last section of the book is blank for notes. Great for ideal planning and helps motivate you. Definitely will buy another as a gift for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: jessica wiercinski

customer_reviews.title: Everyday planner
customer_reviews.text: I use this journal to write down what I do each day so that in the future I can remember what I did. My grandmother can't remember what she did in her early life so I started a journal so I can remember when I'm older. I carry this in my purse and bookbag to jot down meetings, appointments, etc. This is a perfect planner for everything! There's space for notes to write on the sides. There's extra blank pages in the back. It's good for a whole year.
customer_reviews.author: Krubee

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this planner. I haven’t used a planner in years but this does help keep me organized with my new management position. I only gave four stars because I have not used it with all its features. Will update once I do. So far it’s quite incredible with keeping me on task will definitely purchase another one. Also quick thing, pages are super thick I love this! I have the new sharpie pens and sometimes they bleed but never on this paper.
customer_reviews.author: Ashter

customer_reviews.title: Great gift! I would highly recommend this for yourself ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow !! I got 2 of these for gifts for my daughter n son in law and they both using them .!!! My daughter took here to the lawyers office and showed her boss and she was so impressed by this that she's going to Order one for everyone !! Such a. Great gift ! I would highly recommend this for yourself or loved ones or friends . I'm sure they will be very happy with this neat planner !!!! I would give this 100 stars if I could .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Planner
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute planner. The paper is excellent quality, no cheap thin paper to be found here. They covered so many bases with this one, a pen loop, large pocket in the back, and pages to plan out your year. The regular pages have plenty of free and open-ended room to add any information and organize yourself however works best for your needs.
customer_reviews.author: K. Prell-Emmo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect blend of planner and journal
customer_reviews.text: I've tried journal-planners before and never really had much success because they were too involved. Simple Elephant has you set goals and intentions in the first few pages in creative ways. Plus, there are little reminders every so often for you to check back on your goals to stay focused. I think this will probably be the only planner I buy from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Kasperczyk

customer_reviews.title: Sending back
customer_reviews.text: I really do not like this at all. The cover is sturdy but I can't lay it down flat. The monthly calendars are all together in the front. Weekly pages follow them and then note pages. The only good part (to me) is the small spaces to put goals and accomplishments and the few pages in the very front to pre plan. I bought 2. One for me and one for my boyfriend. I will be sending them both back.
customer_reviews.author: memegirl

customer_reviews.title: you have to use it everyday!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this journal it keeps me on track with my goals and reports for the week. I have major depression, and this is the kind of journal my clinic I go to bases the model off of. Affirmations, and a mind map. using goals each week, seeing your successes, journaling every day, this kind of stuff can help you gain positivity in your life if you let it and you use it right. If you don't give it a chance, of course, it won't help you in your life. You have to actually use it and believe in it and believe that it will help your life.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hart

customer_reviews.title: I really do like the calendar
customer_reviews.text: I would probably give this a 4.5 if I could. I really do like the calendar... it is easy to carry, simple, but gives plenty of room to schedule, write notes, etc. My only complaint is that the dates are not printed so I spent a lot of time writing in the dates for the daily and monthly calendars. I know the idea is that you can start this calendar any time of the year, but I would think most people begin their calendars in the new year (or maybe the beginning of the school year), But yes, I would recommend this calendar.
customer_reviews.author: C's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love this planner!!! I actually use it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love this planner!! It has a great simple layout that I customize to my needs (depending on my goals for that season). I'm so happy it comes with the notes section in the back because it's really come in handy for keeping track of my goals and lists that I'm working on. I've tried so many different planners that I can't count and this has worked the best for me. It has enough of a layout to provide good "bones" and still has room for me to be creative and add some color/style. Keep it simple and get your goals accomplished!! Definitely recommend this planner!!
customer_reviews.author: Pris Guti

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This planner is well-made and stylish. It comes with three ribbons attached to separate monthly, weekly, and notes. You fill out the month and year at the top of each page, and the date by each entry. Super convenient if you're like me and buy a planner with the best intentions to use it, but don't. Next time you decide you need a planner again, just start again on the unfilled out page. Ta-da! I also really enjoy the space up top to put my own weekly quote. I'm not really into cutesy quotes so it's nice to pick my own inspiration. All in all, I've been using it for awhile, I totally dig it.
customer_reviews.author: Edgedoggydog

customer_reviews.title: Planner upside down!
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening th package I really like this planner! However ... I went to open up the planner with the elephant symbol in the lower left hand corner (how you normally would) and found that the planner was backwards and upside down! See video! Granted I can still use the planner but kind of annoyed that it is upside down!
customer_reviews.author: ShanEvan88

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great...I actually bought as a gift, but after looking through it I liked it so much that I decided to order another one for myself. I think this is just what I need for the coming year for planning and goals. The planner itself feels like wood quality paper & the cover is nice and pliable. It’s a good size for carrying in a purse. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: ChristyLS

customer_reviews.title: Bought twice
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this twice- once to use myself and a second time to give as a gift. The cover is thick and sturdy yet feels smooth. It’s well laid out so you can start using it at anytime.
customer_reviews.author: ksera123

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Daily Planner
customer_reviews.text: I work and homeschool my children, I used this planner to keep me on task daily. I will fill it out once a week or sometimes the day before review it and refer to it daily. It helps me stay organized and I love how customizable it is. I make it work for me and at first I didn't care for the goals stuff but then I actually started makings some goals for myself and found that the planner helped me actually attain some goals so not bad either. For me, its nice to see something written down to remind me of what I want to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great planner, wish there was more pages
customer_reviews.text: I really like this planner! I love how you can write in your own dates, and I also like how there's a space dedicated to yearly, monthly, and weekly goals. My only issue is that I wish there was one more month page. I have mine going from June 2018-May 2019, but I wish it could go June - June for a full calendar year. There are a lot of pages for notes, which is something I don't really need in a planner so I think some of the note pages could be taken away and made into another month page. Other than that, super great planner!
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Great Planner
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it’s a beautiful made and decent planner out of the box. The only concept of it I don’t understand is all of the full month calendars are together in one section, then it proceeds into the week by week which doesn’t make sense to me like a normal planner. Full month then weeks of that month then over again. But i love the lilac color, it has 3 ribbon markers for multiple pages and overall looks well made.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had never owned an undated planner before purchasing this one. It is so much better for planning purposes because it doesn't waste pages. It is also attractive and I enjoy using it. Stickers come with it to mark months, and I use the colored banner stickers to mark the note pages for each month, color-coded to its corresponding month. I'll would definitely purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: I like this planner. It has a unique set up, 12 month pages are in the front, then the weekly pages, then note pages in the back. I'm used to planners having the month page followed by the week pages, then another month page, etc. It has ribbon bookmarks to separate each area though so it's not too tricky. It's nice that it can be used for any week or month but sometimes annoying to write in the dates. But over all, it is a good quality planner!
customer_reviews.author: msf1

customer_reviews.title: Have to hand-write dates
customer_reviews.text: I can't let myself give this a one-star because maybe this is more common than I thought, but in the past couple decades of using planners, i've never bought one where literally everything was blank, including not having dates. Maybe this seems like a goofy complaint, but a large benefit of a planner is also having a calendar. Instead, I have to hand-write it all. My hand-writing is terrible, so this will look worse. And that's assuming I don't make any mistakes. Will be filling it in and trying it out, but this is still a huge bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Ryne

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I ended up using the journal only some times and not because it's bad but because I found that I personally like other types of journals/planners. However, if you like this free-style type of journal I think you will love this. -The cover material is firm and not flimsy. - The pages are smooth and average in thickness - 3 attatched bookmark ribbons which is perfect if you lose bookmarks or like to have more than one to indicate the monthly, weekly, and notes sections. - Lasts a whole year --Only bad side-- the saturday and sunday sections of the weekly sections have less space than the weekdays, so keep this in mind. Overall a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: What I love about this planner is it's simplicity
customer_reviews.text: What I love about this planner is it's simplicity. You even have page savers to help you get right back to where you left off. After the monthly calendar you have I think a little more than fifty weekly planners, probably enough for the year right? I'm planning on using that after my 12 monthly calendar runs out. I use a RSVP pen and it fits perfectly on the pen holder and I've never been without a pen for the month I've had it so far. Would recommend for students. I'm not a student but I use it for financing and appointments and I prefer to use this over my iPhone reminder system
customer_reviews.author: Hoony Kwak

customer_reviews.title: Really nice planner! Only complaint is that since I had ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice planner! Only complaint is that since I had to fill in the calendar myself, I had two days at the end of the planner that didn't have spaces allotted in the weekly section (since the month I started on started on a Wednesday, not a Monday), but not too bad since there are pages for notes at the end so I added the two days there.The pages aren't too too thick so you can see the ink through the page, but it doesn't bother me. I love the stickers it comes with, too!
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: YES...LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE this little organizer....It's perfect for my crazy desire to be organized and be more productive. I can do my financing with the month section, then daily to do's on the weekly section, as while keeping tabs on things i did well and things i need to improve on. then the notes section is abundant and the little pocket is a serious bonus....I will definitely be buying this planner again...maybe now in case they aren't available next year since it's an not dated..another winning point for me. totally recommend this planner
customer_reviews.author: JB/MA

customer_reviews.title: Nope...
customer_reviews.text: Pages rip easily....very thin paper. Planner markers bleed through easy....so to more liquid pens. The cover is easily scratched...and will take in color from other things...cant clean it off....I've have since January...I've ordered something completely different to replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Best journal I’ve used so far
customer_reviews.text: I like a journal that I can customize and sort of use as a bullet journal. This journal has the proper number of month and week pages to fill a whole year and it also has extra blank pages at the end that you can use for bullet journaling. I also like the weekly and yearly goal trackers. The pages are a bit see thru if you like to use sharpies or of you have a heavy hand with felt pens but overall a great journal.
customer_reviews.author: Megan McGill

customer_reviews.title: More of a hassle than other planners
customer_reviews.text: If you have the time and patience to be constantly filling in dates and details then this is for you. I am a busy college student and this wasn't the product for me, I don't have the patience to be filling in so much on a regular basis. I used it for a few weeks then gave up and bought a planner that already had the dates and weeks filled in and threw this one away. It was also insanely bulky
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Planner for ADD/ADHD
customer_reviews.text: This planner has so many wonderful facets, it has held my attention for a month now. Prior to this I have lost interest in countless planners, some after less than a week. This planner has colorful stickers to hold your attention. Plenty of room for random notes. Places for weekly, monthly, and yearly goals- and it reminds you to constantly revisit them! Cannot say enough good things about this planner!
customer_reviews.author: Reckless Rudi

customer_reviews.title: Good Organizer
customer_reviews.text: Overall good organizer. Love that I can add the dates myself so I can start the planner any day of the year. One thing I didnt like is that the pen holder fell off after a couple day of use which is disappointing. Other then that it's durable
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin

customer_reviews.title: The planner itself is nice and I plan on using it daily
customer_reviews.text: My planner seemed to be warped, either by rain or by design. The pages are somewhat uneven in nature and were very stiff. The planner itself had some scratches on it where the blue was worn off. In the pictures you can see how one cover flap is protruding out and how the spine has a crease and the scratch. The planner itself is nice and I plan on using it daily. The binding is okay and the texture of the cover is very soft. It will be very helpful, but I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: (I still use them for a diary) I'm glad I looked around because this planner is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Moleskin, but they are so expensive that I decided to search for an alternative. (I still use them for a diary) I'm glad I looked around because this planner is awesome. I'm a PhD student at my university and this planner is so dang useful. There's plenty of space at the end for taking little notes, plenty of space per day, and an awesome "my goals" thing at the top of each week that really helps me stay focused. Good quality and 3 little ribbon things! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Juicypounder

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little planner
customer_reviews.text: More than just a planner, I love how it's not like one of those calendar planners where you have to use it within the year and then it's thrown out. You can schedule it however you like with whatever dates you need. The goals pages and stickers are awesome and reminds you for what is important.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tow

customer_reviews.title: Equal to Clever Fox at half the price
customer_reviews.text: A great alternative to the Clever Fox. Pages aren't as thick but are durable. Note pages here are lined and not dotted like Clever Fox. I have both and prefer Simple Elephant.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Wes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect planner!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved all the features of the planner. I like that you can set your own months so you dont have to buy it at a particular time of the year just to get your money's worth. I loved that it had 3 sections to serve different purposes and a place for daily and monthly goals. The 3 ribbon page markers have made it easy for me to keep my page in each section. The design of the planner is beautiful. The only thing I would change is the inclusion of a pen. I was disappointed when I received the planner and it did not include a pen.
customer_reviews.author: Arika

customer_reviews.title: Simple and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this planner! I’m one of those people who love to buy journals and planners, use them for a week and then never pick them up again. Not with this planner! I love that you fill in the months yourself so you don’t have to start on a certain month. I love the by-the-week section, which I use for meal planning. I love the many pages of notes in the back, and I love the goals you can set at the beginning. I think I’ll be buying this every year. Wish there was more color choices though!
customer_reviews.author: Reader B

customer_reviews.title: Hurry!! Find your Elephant!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second year using my Elephant and I love love love it! From the mind map to the extra room in the back with the pocket, it's simply a great planner!
customer_reviews.author: TrlBlzr

product_meta.title: Simple Elephant Planner 2020-2021 - Daily, Weekly, Monthly - High Performance Organizer for Productivity, Gratitude, and Focus - Undated Journal & Agenda (Blue)
feature_bullets: CARVE A PATH TO SUCCESS: Our Undated 2020-2021 Planner is built to focus on daily, weekly and monthly planning to simply get things done. Build your most successful and productive year yet for your work tasks, business, personal finance goals, or your physical & mental health!

VISUALIZE YOUR YEAR: Our Mindmap & Vision board fully engage the mind for a 90 day or monthly gratitude plan to envision your success throughout the year! No wasted space with motivational book quotes, simply a blank canvas to draw your master plans!

PRODUCTIVITY MEETS QUALITY: Thick NO-BLEED paper (110gsm) & durable soft leatherette hardcover make for an incredible planning experience for working professionals, and the perfect back to school gift for students & teachers! Built as an organizer or for someone looking to create goal setting habits.
TRACK YOUR GOALS AND PROGRESS: Included are a bonus set of eBooks, infographics, and stickers to mark all your priorities and top ideas for your next major project.

START PLANNING YOUR BEST YEAR NOW: Trusted notebook and journal by thousands of customers for self-improvement -- we are 100% confident the Simple Elephant Planner will set you on the path to crush your 2020 goals!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,735 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
